item.title: Academic
item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes ðŸš€ Latest release Star

Biography Currently Research Engineer at 7 sensing software. I was a Research Fellow at the Trinity College of Dublin. I worked with Professor Aljosa Smolic in the VSENSE team. My research interests were computer vision, acquisition, photorealistic and non-photorealistic rendering, data science and deep neural networks. During my PostDoc I mostly focused on 2D animation techniques. I obtained my engineering Degree in Electronic (specialized in Multimedia Technologies) from ENSEIRB-MATMECA graduate school of engineering.

item.title: PhD Thesis
